name: Construction Simulator 2+3
overview: For fans of heavy construction machinery, this great value pack combines the console versions of both the second and third editions of Construction Simulator. Take the opportunity to drive some of the world's mightiest mechanical beasts in both Europe and the US. Get behind the wheel of over 70 construction machines officially licensed from 14 Giants of the industry such as LIEBHERR, Caterpillar and Palfinger. Discover two fictitious towns with distinct European and American maps with a 20 km2 map to explore and dozens of hours of gameplay on one game card. Take your favourite construction machines for a spin and drive, dig or build - wherever you want!
